page.title: 09TOURISM
page.content: Many people visit Chedworth because the village is full of places to see. There is a Roman Villa a mile away, a Norman church,a medieval Manor House,a Farm Trail and many old houses and cottages. Some people come for the day and have lunch at the pub The Seven Tuns or a cream tea at Camomile Cottage.The pub is just over the road from the church,it has a bar,a dining room and a games room with a snooker table and a fruit machine. We have quite a lot of houses offering Bed and Breakfast in the village, Like Adelaide Cottage, Peach Tree Cottage and Hartbury Farm. It costs 5.00 each for one night. There are also Holiday Cottages where people stay for a week or more while they look around the village.They also have to buy their
